TopicTitle: Is there a way to hide large spoilers whilst editing?

Articles.Content:
Not about gameplay, but about the forums.

When I am editing a page with spoilers, there is a lot of text in the spoilers. I tend to make spoliers to hide large amounts of text, but is there a way to hide them whilst editing/creating a post?

Thanks, DMSP

(Also, if you could, add this feature! I will help in any way!)

I understand your meaning; I write a story which is a massive pain to edit up on the forums. As far as I know, there's no way to collapse sections of text while you're editing it.

My suggestion is to write up whatever you need in another text editor, then simply copy-and-paste into the forums when you're done.
